DOC.detailed_description: One hundred high risk woman 70 low risk woman include . Inclusion criterion high risk group : personal history pre eclampsia and/or IUGR previous pregnancy , diabetes , auto-immune syndrome LUPUS , hypertension , renal insufficiency , anti-phospholipid syndrome.Patients ( 18 year old ) include 11 14 ( +6days ) WG .
